description:
It was discovered that fstream incorrectly handled certain crafted
tarballs. An attacker could use this vulnerability to write arbitrary files
to the filesystem.

node-fstream.description: Advanced filesystem streaming tools for Node.js
Advanced filesystem streaming tools for Node.js

title: fstream vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
fstream could be made to overwrite files as the administrator if it
received specially crafted tarballs.
